details:
noun
- unrestrained excitement or enthusiasm
= example: unrestrained excitement or enthusiasm
= synonyms: rabidity
- the quality of being rash and foolish
= synonyms: folly
- a feeling of intense anger
= synonyms: fury, rage, infuriation, enragement
- an acute viral disease of the nervous system of warm-blooded animals (usually transmitted by the bite of a rabid animal)
= synonyms: rabies, hydrophobia, lyssa
- obsolete terms for legal insanity
= synonyms: lunacy
